plans.title: Sprint Plan â€“ Last 3 Months ka Tehelka ğŸ
messages: 90 days = 90 chances to change your destiny ğŸ’¥  Ab time hai smart aur focused banne ka.
30-45-15 formula yaad rakho: ğŸ“† 30 din â€“ High weight NCERT chapters â€¢ ğŸ“† 45 din â€“ Mock test + error log â€¢ ğŸ“† 15 din â€“ Revision & rest
Daily routine: Morning â€“ Notes revise (1.5 hr) â€¢ Afternoon â€“ Mock/Practice (2 hr) â€¢ Evening â€“ Error analysis (1 hr) â€¢ Night â€“ Flashcards / Concept recap (30 min)
Last 20 din me koi naya topic mat uthao. Confidence build karo, speed aur accuracy dono par kaam karo.

plans.title: Dropper Plan â€“ Ek Saal, Ek Mauka ğŸ”
plans.audience: Repeaters focusing for a full year
messages: Drop lena failure nahi hota â€” maturity hoti hai. Ab tumhare paas time hai apni story rewrite karne ka âœï¸
Golden Formula: 1â€“4 months â†’ Concept rebuild â€¢ 5â€“8 months â†’ Full syllabus + mocks â€¢ 9â€“12 months â†’ Revision + speed boost
Har test ka ek â€œError Trackerâ€ banao. Toppers apni galtiyon se grow karte hain, ignore nahi.
NCERT ko base rakho, fir coaching notes padho. Kuch bhi new padho to uska 10Q practice zaroor karo.
Jab motivation kam ho, yaad rakho: â€œEk saal sacrifice karke poori life upgrade hoti hai.â€

plans.title: Recovery Plan â€“ Comeback Stronger ğŸ”„
plans.audience: Students who lost consistency or confidence
messages: Break liya tha? Koi baat nahi ğŸ’›  Topper bhi kabhi kabhi rukte hain, par rukne ke baad wapas aate hain aur tez daudte hain.
Pehle guilt chhodo. Ab restart mode on karo. Aaj se 20-20 rule: Roz 20 pages + 20 mins quiz.
Focus ke liye chhoti routine rakho: â€¢ 1 chapter per day â€¢ 10 questions â€¢ 1 self-note on what improved today
Motivation kam lag raha hai? Ek chhoti win likho â€” â€œAaj 1 hour padha.â€ Bas itna hi kaafi hai.
Yaad rakho: â€œReset â‰  failure. It means you care again.â€
nudge_lines: Comeback stories hi inspire karti hain â€” aaj se tumhari shuru ğŸ’«

messages: Ab time kam hai, par panic se kuch nahi milega. Toppers last month me sirf revise aur relax karte hain.
Focus 3-R Rule pe: ğŸ§  Revise â†’ Repeat â†’ Relax
Daily routine: â€¢ 2 chapters Bio revise â€¢ 1 mock test every alternate day â€¢ 30 mins light walk / music
Avoid new topics aur heavy material. Bas apne strong areas polish karo.
Mindset tip: â€œCalm brain = fast recall.â€ Last month me peace of mind hi topper ka weapon hai.
